extendedInfo.description: If you are Little Mix's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Little Mix's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Little Mix's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Little Mix's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- DNA--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- Wings- DNA- Always Be Together- Case Closed- Change Your Life- Going Nowhere- How Ya Doin'?- Love Drunk- Madhouse- Make You Believe- Pretend It's OK- Red Planet- Stereo Soldier- Turn Your Face- We Are Who We Are- We Are Young (Acoustic)

reviews.title: Excellent , Great App. Any fan ... Download it
reviews.comment: This app is excellent , if you like to listen to little mix and sing along , but don\'t know the words ... Then download this\'..... Brilliant app
reviews.author: Gary Liam Katie Burke

reviews.title: Amazayn
reviews.comment: This is amzayn when I\'m listening 2 little mix and I\'ve mabey forgetten the lyrics I go on the app and learn them again I recomend any mixers get it
reviews.author: Zak Bright

reviews.title: I love all your apps
reviews.comment: Its so good, i just play the music and read the lyrics, whitch i actually don\'t have to do but just incase :)

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I LOVE this it is worth downloading xx
